EmailTemplate.name: NEW Scott Essential Dispenser
EmailTemplate.subject: NEW Scott Essential Dispenser
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
I really appreciate your time and continued business with Office Depot, so I wanted to take a couple of minutes to let you know about a great offer we currently have going.
Office Depot has partnered with Kimberly-Clark to announce the release of their NEW Scott Essential Dispenser, with pressure to save money and manage time effectively in the workplace I wanted to make sure you were the first to hear about the benefits of a reliable dispensing system.
WHY SCOTT ESSENTIAL?
· Backed by the Scott brand you know and trust
· Backed by Kimberly-Clark's Lifetime Warranty
· Touchless dispensing
· Battery Free
· Easy Reload
· Lower priced refills
· Scott refills are ECOLOGO& FSC certified
· Ask me about multi-unit discounts!
